title: 10 game chat restriction. Questionable?
body:
Well i know i did go overboard a little bit by using a "bad phrase" or two as they put it. But it was all banter between me and 2 other players. One of my friends can attest to it as it was a game we played in normals. Here is what i got chat restricted for. 
In-Game
Thy Headstrong: k soooo
Thy Headstrong: fiora isnt a lane.
Thy Headstrong: they double jung?
Thy Headstrong: weird shit
Thy Headstrong: fiora trolling?
Thy Headstrong: lol;
Thy Headstrong: so report fiora... ok
Thy Headstrong: look at that... easy 2 kills and turret
Thy Headstrong: make that easy 3 kills
Thy Headstrong: so is that top lane turret
Thy Headstrong: ez
Thy Headstrong: Ez turret bot
Thy Headstrong: nah. Least im not at five.
Thy Headstrong: 3v11 scrubs
Thy Headstrong: you wish you had a top turret
Thy Headstrong: idk
Thy Headstrong: 4 for 1 ez
Thy Headstrong: Thats more sad.
Thy Headstrong: lol if that was a 1v1 then youd get kicked harder in the head as a child than i thought.
Thy Headstrong: After i was less than 10% hp? Man.
Thy Headstrong: sucker
Thy Headstrong: You die because you suck.
Thy Headstrong: If i int then you all straight wintraders.
Thy Headstrong: I suck.
Thy Headstrong: Rivens my worst champ.
Thy Headstrong: Im positive cus yall suck worse.
Thy Headstrong: Why you never got to 5/0
Thy Headstrong: 2 jungs and only one drag. omegalul
Thy Headstrong: Smh.
Thy Headstrong: I wouldnt if i had a trolling fiora.
Thy Headstrong: How many solo kills have you personally gotten? 100% hp to 0?
Thy Headstrong: How many turrets have you gotten top?
Thy Headstrong: 0
Thy Headstrong: Your stupidity is enough to lose you the game
Thy Headstrong: I know lol.
Thy Headstrong: Im just shittalking them.
Thy Headstrong: What a baddie.
Thy Headstrong: Cmon? What are you doing?
Thy Headstrong: Dying to my team? Pfft.
Thy Headstrong: 2 for 1 pfft
Thy Headstrong: towers
Thy Headstrong: correction
Thy Headstrong: Towers and inhibs
Thy Headstrong: Youve had more than me.
Thy Headstrong: And less towers.
Thy Headstrong: I had a lot of fun.
Thy Headstrong: And no rage. Cus i knew i would win.
Thy Headstrong: Soon as i saw double jung.
Thy Headstrong: It makes fun more easier.
Thy Headstrong: And less pressure.
Thy Headstrong: fiora 1v1 dragon.
Thy Headstrong: pussy
Thy Headstrong: And as you see my team got baron
Thy Headstrong: so bigger pepega.
Thy Headstrong: And wrecking you.
Thy Headstrong: you guys lost a 4v5
Thy Headstrong: kek
Thy Headstrong: yall lost a 4v5
However i would like to see chat through the whole game so i can appeal to riot. How would i do that. Because the things they said were way worse. And i took it in stride as i just thought it was banter. One of the players actually said good banter after the game to me. And he added me to friends before getting off.  I can see some of the things said due to having my overwolf running. As said i know the phrases "pussy" and "kicked in the head as a child" taken out of context are not the best. But this is the first time i have ever gotten a chat restriction with language worse than this before. Since karma was originally released i have been playing this game and have never been more disappointed in league. So i may not play for a while after this. When people get harshly treated for simple banter i feel like this game has really gone downhill.

Edit: Cant believe league has so many sjws now.

replies.body: It's not about who said worse... that's not how it works...

I know thats not how it works. That wasnt the main point. The main point is that it was all banter. And i only said that stuff because they said worse. Not like i initiated the banter either. Or initiated the harsher terms. I was just meeting banter for banter. Punch for punch you know.

That´s not how it works, there is no eye for an eye law in League of Legends.
If you don't like what others are writing on the chat, either you mute them or you ignore them, but the moment you behave the same as them, you are also electable for a ban. Like just happened to you in this case.

Well i guess bsing is not good now? Only reason i even said the questionable material is because i was called worse. So people just get scoff free for engaging the harmless banter. But one person reports me on 1 game and i get chat restricted. I get there is no eye for eye law. What i dont get is why i get chat restricted and no one else got anything. I guess i cant even banter now.

Bro, why are you running in circles? Everyone in this post is proving you wrong, but still you try to make your point.
I recommend you to listen and think why not even one person is sharing your rant.

Thy Headstrong: weird shit
Thy Headstrong: fiora trolling?
Thy Headstrong: so report fiora... ok
Thy Headstrong: 3v11 scrubs
Thy Headstrong: lol if that was a 1v1 then youd get kicked harder in the head as a child than i thought.
Thy Headstrong: After i was less than 10% hp? Man.
Thy Headstrong: sucker
Thy Headstrong: You die because you suck.
Thy Headstrong: If i int then you all straight wintraders.
Thy Headstrong: I suck.
Thy Headstrong: Im positive cus yall suck worse.
Thy Headstrong: Why you never got to 5/0
Thy Headstrong: 2 jungs and only one drag. omegalul
Thy Headstrong: I wouldnt if i had a trolling fiora.
Thy Headstrong: How many solo kills have you personally gotten? 100% hp to 0?
Thy Headstrong: How many turrets have you gotten top?
Thy Headstrong: 0
Thy Headstrong: Your stupidity is enough to lose you the game
Thy Headstrong: Im just shittalking them.
Thy Headstrong: What a baddie.
Thy Headstrong: Cmon? What are you doing?
Thy Headstrong: Dying to my team? Pfft.
Thy Headstrong: pussy

You was harrassing your team , enemy team / flaming etc. Totally deserved. If you dont change your attittude the next punishment is gonna be 25 games.

Was not harassing or flaming. As i keep saying. It was banter. Honestly fiora was trolling and people asked me to report him or was trying a new tactic. Idk. I obviously state that i was shittalking them. Idk where you find flaming in competitive bsing.
Not sure why you have to be told this by everyone: **It does not matter what others were saying, this behavior is not banter, it’s flaming and harassment**.
And i dont know how many times i have to say it. It was banter. The other team even agreed with me. We had a jolly good time in postgame.

You can keep repeating it all you want but that is not banter. It doesn't matter how many people you have agreeing with you when you say a cow is a bird and can fly - it doesn't make it true. You harassed the fiora - and have continued to do so here by continuing to call for reports on them.

Your idea of "shit talk" is not competitive BS - it is you flaming. At no time has it **EVER** been acceptable to repeatedly and continually flame someone for their behavior. That's not shit-talk, it's against the rules - period.

No matter how much you say it, it doesn't matter what the enemy team thinks - you flamed Fiora, and regardless of who reported you for it, it's punishable. You don't get to flame someone just because you think they're trolling.

And i dont know how many times i have to say it. Everything was fun. The fiora didnt get reported by me or my friend there. Honestly. It was the most fun game i had in a while because some people and me were bsing back and forth. The funny thing is is they called me all names under the sun that if i wanted to I could make a complaint about. But i guess its whatever. I just wanted chat logs for the game and post game lobby. But apparently thats too much to ask. All the things i said were in a good spirited game. Im taking the chat restriction because i dont type much. When i do its usually to say sorry for sucking. But i dont know. The more and more people saying that i deserve it the more and more i dont want to play this game. Thats what i hate about riots system. It only takes into account the chat out of context. If you saw the things that were said towards me people would have a fit.

You not reporting them doesn't matter. **You continually flamed and harassed someone for this entire game**. That is not acceptable. Period. Full stop. You don't get to flame/harass others even if some of your teammates/enemy players think it's "fun". The rules do not say it's okay ever. The rules do not say it's okay if they were worse. The rules say it's never okay.

Then what is competitive bsing so i know for the future? Because I like my honor level 5. And the mute button is there for a reason. Honestly the fiora was salty so reported me. I know the pussy and kicked in the head was overboard. So if thats what they chalk it up to then fine. What i would like is a more competent report system. If my restriction can make it better then thats what i want. But as i see it, its broken.

You're only claiming it's broken because it's working.

You don't get the right to flame/harass people simply because you want to say it is "competitive BS" or "back and forth banter". It is neither of those things, never has been, and never will be. Flaming and harassment of others for their gameplay/behavior/performance/being bad/whatever has never been "BS" nor has it been "banter" - period.
Then answer me. What is competitive bs?

Competitive BS would be **lightly** teasing an enemy for a mistake - by definition competitive BS must be with someone you’re competing against. You are not competing against your teammates. They are your teammates.
Tbh, this is not a banter, this is harassment and flaming.
Sigh. Obviously league is getting too sjw for my taste when back and forth banter is interpreted as flaming.

> [{quoted}](name=Thy Headstrong,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=oegLWBIO,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-12-22T09:51:04.934+0000)
>
> But it was all banter between me and 2 other players. One of my friends can attest to it as it was a game we played in normals.

Duo queuing with a friend doesn't give you permission to flame the three randoms you get matched with.


> [{quoted}](name=Thy Headstrong,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=oegLWBIO,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-12-22T09:51:04.934+0000)
>
> However i would like to see chat through the whole game so i can appeal to riot. How would i do that. Because the things they said were way worse. And i took it in stride as i just thought it was banter. One of the players actually said good banter after the game to me. And he added me to friends before getting off.  I can see some of the things said due to having my overwolf running. As said i know the phrases "pussy" and "kicked in the head as a child" taken out of context are not the best. But this is the first time i have ever gotten a chat restriction with language worse than this before. Since karma was originally released i have been playing this game and have never been more disappointed in league. So i may not play for a while after this. When people get harshly treated for simple banter i feel like this game has really gone downhill.

If you misbehave but a teammate or opponent does or says something even worse, you should definitely report them after the match, just as someone reported you for your own misbehavior. Yes, that's certainly possible. Reports are not a limited resource. Any time someone believes that another player violated LoL's behavioral standards, they can report that player. Punishments are similarly not limited: if more than one player in a game merits a punishment, they can both get a punishment. This can happen even if the players in question were antagonizing each other. The IFS doesn't need to weigh the severity of all reported players' actions and then "award" the "winner" with a punishment; it's not a contest.

Think of it like dealing with a noisy person in a library: ask them to keep it down, and then notify library staff and move to another area if that doesn't work. If you get into a shouting match with them, you're just as likely to be removed, even if you weren't shouting _quite_ as loudly as they were. The goal is a quiet library.

I'm happy to hear that your behavior has improved, but the system wants your behavior to be _acceptable_, not just _less unacceptable_ than what you have demonstrated in the past.

The only chat messages included in your chat log are your own for a single, extremely good reason: they are the only ones taken into account for your punishment, because they're the only ones in your control. The things other players said and did in your match might produce in you an impulse to do certain things that may include breaking LoL's rules, but your behavior is your own, and you are responsible for it. If you really think about it, this is a good thing. If a toxic player's goading could exempt you from punishment for your flaming them, calling for reports, etc., then it would logically go the other way as well, resulting in punishments for players who didn't necessarily break any rules but weren't quite as friendly and positive as their teammates. Can you imagine a world where "didn't participate in the dance party and ignored all of our jokes" was a valid report that could get someone suspended for two weeks? We don't want that situation anymore than we want "called our support a braindead waste of space" to be considered an _invalid_ report just because, say, the support was telling their team to harm themselves while they merrily ran it down mid.

You weren't punished for misbehaving in one game. You were punished for misbehaving in _one more_ game, in a consistent pattern of negative behavior that breaks the game's rules. Additionally, the reform card doesn't always show all the matches that led to your punishment: it randomly selects up to several matches. You might see three matches, but you also might see as few as one, even for players whose punishment stems not from a small number of egregious infractions but rather from dozens of instances of mild toxicity. The purpose of the reform card is to tell you how to reform, so it shows you an example of the behavior that prompted your punishment and explains that such behavior is inappropriate and should be avoided if you want to maintain an account in good standing.

See what i see as sad is i wasnt flaming my team. It was me the fiora and anivia all bsing each other. They say ez drag. id say ez tower and kills. They called me a dumbass, stupid i said 1v1 dragon because the fiora had been saying 1v1 in scenarios where it definitely wasnt 1v1. And i dont think unjust reports reform. It just makes me want to make a new account and see how long it takes to get banned with shit talk. Everyone is saying its just but that was one game. I rarely ever type due to my mental illnesses having the better of me. If they told me how many reports i got. Full chat logs. Or an actual reason that i can see for why i got chat restricted then maybe id have an easier time accepting it. But i know fiora reported me. Because he was salty. What i want to know is if it was one report or more. I keep snippets of my games due to lolwiz game summary. So i can show multiple accounts of me not being toxic. Ive never called anyone a racial slur. This was my first offence. And honestly i dont care about the chat restriction. What i care about is the honor being lowered. Because i pride myself on being honor level 5.

> [{quoted}](name=Thy Headstrong,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=oegLWBIO,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-12-22T22:12:55.364+0000)
>
> See what i see as sad is i wasnt flaming my team.

I looked over your logs, and yes you were flaming your team. The punishment isn't questionable at all. It was 100% accurate.

> [{quoted}](name=Thy Headstrong,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=oegLWBIO,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-12-22T22:12:55.364+0000)
>
> It was me the fiora and anivia all bsing each other. They say ez drag. id say ez tower and kills. They called me a dumbass, stupid i said 1v1 dragon because the fiora had been saying 1v1 in scenarios where it definitely wasnt 1v1.

_Their_ actions are not factored into _your_ punishment, which is based only on what _you_ do.

> [{quoted}](name=Thy Headstrong,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=oegLWBIO,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-12-22T22:12:55.364+0000)
>
> And i dont think unjust reports reform.

Irrelevant, because this was a just punishment from correct reports.

> [{quoted}](name=Thy Headstrong,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=oegLWBIO,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-12-22T22:12:55.364+0000)
>
> It just makes me want to make a new account and see how long it takes to get banned with shit talk.

That's not something I would hear from someone who even tries to follow the rules and behave themselves.

> [{quoted}](name=Thy Headstrong,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=oegLWBIO,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-12-22T22:12:55.364+0000)
>
> Everyone is saying its just

Yes. Doesn't that tell you something? Isn't that something "hmm, my behavior was bad and I should improve it if I don't want to get permabanned one day"?

> [{quoted}](name=Thy Headstrong,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=oegLWBIO,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-12-22T22:12:55.364+0000)
>
> but that was one game.

As I said:

You weren't punished for misbehaving in one game. You were punished for misbehaving in _one more_ game, in a consistent pattern of negative behavior that breaks the game's rules. Additionally, the reform card doesn't always show all the matches that led to your punishment: it randomly selects up to several matches. You might see three matches, but you also might see as few as one, even for players whose punishment stems not from a small number of egregious infractions but rather from dozens of instances of mild toxicity. The purpose of the reform card is to tell you how to reform, so it shows you an example of the behavior that prompted your punishment and explains that such behavior is inappropriate and should be avoided if you want to maintain an account in good standing.

> [{quoted}](name=Thy Headstrong,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=oegLWBIO,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-12-22T22:12:55.364+0000)
>
> I rarely ever type due to my mental illnesses having the better of me.

That is an acceptable solution. If you know you can't participate in chat without breaking rules, you can avoid breaking rules by choosing not to participate in chat. Perfectly fine.

> [{quoted}](name=Thy Headstrong,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=oegLWBIO,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-12-22T22:12:55.364+0000)
>
> If they told me how many reports i got. Full chat logs. Or an actual reason that i can see for why i got chat restricted then maybe id have an easier time accepting it.

You have been told by several people now that the _actual reason_ you got punished is because your behavior was _far_ below the standards of behavior that Riot sets for their game. Your opinion of your behavior doesn't much matter, because it's not your game and not your rules. Just accept that your chat was bad according to the rules. Insisting that it was fine accomplishes nothing for anyone.

> [{quoted}](name=Thy Headstrong,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=oegLWBIO,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-12-22T22:12:55.364+0000)
>
> But i know fiora reported me. Because he was salty.

Okay. Irrelevant, but okay.

> [{quoted}](name=Thy Headstrong,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=oegLWBIO,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-12-22T22:12:55.364+0000)
>
> What i want to know is if it was one report or more.

Also irrelevant. Your behavior merited a punishment.

> [{quoted}](name=Thy Headstrong,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=oegLWBIO,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-12-22T22:12:55.364+0000)
>
> I keep snippets of my games due to lolwiz game summary. So i can show multiple accounts of me not being toxic.

And here's a match where you were very toxic, and that's what you were punished for.

> [{quoted}](name=Thy Headstrong,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=oegLWBIO,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-12-22T22:12:55.364+0000)
>
> Ive never called anyone a racial slur.

That's great. But you still have room for improvement.

> [{quoted}](name=Thy Headstrong,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=oegLWBIO,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-12-22T22:12:55.364+0000)
>
> This was my first offence.

Okay. Hopefully you'll learn and not get anymore punishments.

> [{quoted}](name=Thy Headstrong,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=oegLWBIO,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-12-22T22:12:55.364+0000)
>
> And honestly i dont care about the chat restriction. What i care about is the honor being lowered. Because i pride myself on being honor level 5.

Then you'll need to consistently behave in an honorable fashion instead of calling people stupid scrub pussy baddie suckers who got kicked in the head as children.

Just another person who sees a 6 while i see a 9. You guys will never understand as their is only one side of the story.  Half those were in all chat half were not. Do you have my logs or snippets of the game? If so i would love if you could email me them.

> [{quoted}](name=Thy Headstrong,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=oegLWBIO,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2019-12-22T23:01:00.951+0000)
>
> Just another person who sees a 6 while i see a 9. You guys will never understand as their is only one side of the story.  Half those were in all chat half were not. Do you have my logs or snippets of the game? If so i would love if you could email me them.

You can see whatever you want, but it is a fact that we see a 6. Do you understand how it could be viewed as a 6? It really doesn't matter whether you see a 9. What matters is whether you know why it looks like a 6 and avoid doing it again.

There aren't really any "sides." Someone didn't like your chat, and it's obvious - to the IFS, to me, to everyone here who follows the rules - why that might be the case.

You call people stupid scrub pussy baddie suckers who got kicked in the head as children. You admit that maybe this is a little overboard, and maybe not the best thing to say - and yet you find it inconceivable that other people would agree with that assessment. And then you think that your "overboard, not the best" chat is perfectly fine. And you find it inconceivable that other people would disagree with that assessment.

There is no "A" for effort here. You have to actually convince people that you're innocent of wrongdoing, and it's clearly not happening. Play through your chat restriction, and either change your behavior to fit what's expected of you or get more punishments. Up to you. Goodbye.

Same here. I got 10 restriction. They didn't (at least no recent feedback). They shamed my plays + said I bought account. They started the flame. Like wtf rito ? I have ban bcs I used one restriction word and they don't ? Kappa. Tell me one reason why Vel'Koz who never cooperated all time was saying that I am boosted and that I sck shouldn't have. And I got when I just said to him that he is r%%%%%ed.
how do you know they didnt got banned?
No recent feedback ?
not everytime you get a feedback.

Well since I am playing tanks or utility champions this is happening every lost game. I don't deal dmg so I am boosted and bought account. I really don't think that all this players got restricted i report them every game nothing always happens. But why would this harass should not be reportable ? It's behavior of r%%%%%s to accuse somebody who has diamond for over 3  seasons only because he don't like to play dmg dealing champions. Not to mention that there has to be one game ofc where your nerves don't keep cool. I can't keep cool every-time they blame me. It's absolutely annoying. Not even pro players keep cool every game. Jankos raging over scuttle crab steal every time for example. We are not perfect human beings and when somebody flames us we don't always have what it takes to stay cool.

then i have to be some sort of an alien since im playing from season 1 and i havent been punished or lost my cool once lol  it's kinda furstrating tbh but chatting wont help us at all. At my main account i was diamond 2. here im playing for fun mostly and im gold 2 , sometimes my adc wants to report me because im warding.... Fighting with him in the chat wont help at any point... ^^ thats why im not saying anythign just muting him.

Can I see your skin from good behavior then ? I have that Kayle btw, do you ? Just somehow i don't trust you. Mainly because you missed the point of my whole post. Not to mention that you want to play a good guy and you keep down-voting me without reason when all I do is discussing. That's not how enlighten people works. Looks like you enjoy it. Hidden sadism ? I don't really believe you. I mute people almost all games. One i didn't. Really deserved.

First of all im not down voting you. Lets get that clear i dont want you to believe me , honestly i dont care :) since im keeping my accounts ban free, thats enough for me. Im not getting anything if you believe me so yeah... No point in that. Im not playing a good guy or a bad guy. I just wanted to give you an advice. Thank you for your time and have a good day :3

Didn't wanted to comment, but Son from Tottenham got me nice argument. He is clearly a good player and good man showing lot of good deeds in real life. But on Facebook everybody blames him for his accident from . So he was passive aggressive and got red card again. Do you understand it now ? I am not bad. He is not bad. We are just totally exhausted from bad people. They are leading us to act not like we would want. And FIFA and RITO thinks it's fun to just blame us. When there are clearly players who provoke and abuse this system to get us banned. I know that I am not so great as Son, but that's not the point.

So what was the full game chat log? ... where is it so we can actually judge the conduct... this so far is very one sided, and that is not how judgement is supposed to work... show the whole log, or this is by default unfair. This is all out of context... what was said to and from whom... were others trolling it on? we don't know; because we don't have the full log.
I wish i had full chat log. That way people could see and could stop being so upset. Everything was in good fun. Until i got the chat restriction.

Yeah I try not to say anything in chat when I can... as it always lead to bad things even for me and I am a cool head up until I am called a r%%%%% or such... but did those people get chat restricted or punished... nope; the system is broken and I take all of this with a grain of salt... yeah it stings a little in the recently opened wound... but all you can do at this point is to lick your wounds and watch what your typing from now on; don't let them bait you... do /muteall instead and just screw it like I have to some games...

Seriously.. I get a chat filter of the word R e T a R d? on the forums... but they can type it in game... what is this bullshit?

Im not even mad about getting punished that much. Im mad that it was unjust. I dont care if they dont revert chat restriction as its already almost over. No point. What i do care about is getting the information right. And i cant do that without full chat logs.
